paragraphs.text:
%md
## MMOD: Lab1 Базовая случайная величина. Генерация непрерывных и дискретных случайных величин.

msg.data: MMOD: Lab1 Базовая случайная величина. Генерация непрерывных и дискретных случайных величин.

import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
defined class LinearCongruentGenerator
random: LinearCongruentGenerator = LinearCongruentGenerator@12be5bf8
randomDf: (range: Int, random: LinearCongruentGenerator, columnName: String)org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame

paragraphs.text:
val N = 1000000 // Sample size
val M = 20 // Bins count

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
val EV = df.agg(avg('value)).first.getDouble(0)
val EV2 = scala.math.pow(EV, 2)
val D = df.agg(avg(pow('value, 2) - EV2)).first.getDouble(0)

val b = 0.95
val l = (1 + b) / 2 // 2.25
val e = 2.25 * scala.math.pow(D, 0.5) / scala.math.pow(N, 0.5)
val IEV = (EV - e, EV + e)

val df2 = randomDf(N, random, "value2") // Generating a second one sample
df2.show

val dfid = df.withColumn("id", monotonically_increasing_id)
val dfid2 = df2.withColumn("id", monotonically_increasing_id)

val joined = dfid.join(dfid2, dfid.col("id") === dfid2.col("id"))
val R = joined.agg((avg('value * 'value2) * 12) - 3).first.getDouble(0)

val pi = 1.0 / M
val groupedDf = df.withColumn("int_id", ('value * M).cast(IntegerType)).groupBy("int_id").agg((count("*") / N).as("pi_"))
val xi2 = N * groupedDf.agg(sum(pow('pi_ - pi, 2) / pi)).first.getDouble(0)
// xi2(a, k = 20 - 1) > 34.8
xi2 < 34.8

msg.data:
pi: Double = 0.05
groupedDf: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [int_id: int, pi_: double]
xi2: Double = 20.66800000000006
res3: Boolean = true

paragraphs.text:
import scala.math.{tan, Pi}

def G(x: Double) = tan(Pi * (x - 0.5))

val Gudf = udf(G(_:Double):Double)
val cauchyDistribution = randomDf(N, random).select(Gudf('value).as("value"))

val a = -5.0
val b = 5.0
val M = 20.0
val interval = (b - a) / M
val groupedDf = cauchyDistribution.filter('value > a && 'value < b).withColumn("int_id", (('value - a) / interval).cast(IntegerType)).groupBy('int_id).agg((count("*") / N.toDouble).as("pi_"))
z.show(groupedDf)

paragraphs.text:
%md
### Lets take a normal distribution from -n to n and generate probability and distribution function values

msg.data: Lets take a normal distribution from -n to n and generate probability and distribution function values

paragraphs.text:
val n = 100
val k = 20.0

def nd(x: Double) = {
    ((1 / scala.math.pow(2 * Pi, 0.5)) * scala.math.exp(-scala.math.pow(x, 2)/2))
}
val p = (-n to n).map(i => nd(i / k)).toList
var s = 0.0
val dfv = p.map(pi => {s += (pi / k); s})

paragraphs.text:
println("%table\nx\ty")
(0 until p.length).foreach(i => println(i + "\t" + p.take(i + 1).sum / k))

%md
### Generating a sample for N values from a to b

msg.data: Generating a sample for N values from a to b

N: Int = 10000
a: Double = 0.0
b: Double = 200.0

paragraphs.text: val res: List[Double] = (0 until N).map(i => dfv.count(_ <= random.next).toDouble * (b - a) / (2 * n) + a).toList

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row

val df = spark.createDataFrame(
    spark.sparkContext.parallelize(res).map(t => Row(t)), 
    StructType(
        Seq(
            StructField("value", DataTypes.DoubleType, false)
            )
    )
)

z.show(df.withColumn("value", 'value).groupBy('value).count)

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [value: double]

paragraphs.text:
val EV = df.select(avg('value)).first.getDouble(0)
val EV2 = scala.math.pow(EV, 2)

val D2 = df.select(avg(pow('value, 2) - EV2)).first.getDouble(0)
scala.math.pow(D2, 0.5)

%md
### Calculating interval Mean and Deviation intervals

msg.data: Calculating interval Mean and Deviation intervals

paragraphs.text:
val (a, b) = (90.0, 110.0)
val M = 20
val interval = (b - a) / M

val groupedDf = df.filter('value > a && 'value < b).withColumn("int_id", (('value - a) / interval).cast(IntegerType)).groupBy('int_id).agg((count("*") / N.toDouble).as("pi_"))
// val xi2 = N * groupedDf.agg(sum(pow('pi_ - pi('int_id), 2) / pi('int_id))).first.getDouble(0)
